column1: How long do I have to wait for an advisor? Ma delivery slot for which I have waited SINCE BEFPRE CHRISTMASN(!) will run out at 11.32 am. I am nearly 90 and desperately need the items I have ordered.
i have sent the contact form ... i need a response by return please.
I sent a query to your Customer Service team about my order when will I hear back?
I was promised a 24 hour reply as to how as a reglar
